title: New: The 1975 – Sex
content: So they’ve gone through more bands names than Viva Brother and Coasts combined, which is saying something, yet thankfully The 1975 (formerly known as Drive Like I Do, T H E B I G S L E E P, The Slowdown etc. etc.) have the tunes to make it not appear quite as annoying. With the release of their fantastic debut EP earlier this year, they’re now readying what will surely be their ‘breakthrough’ single; the gritty, infectious and downright adorably sleazy Sex. With it’s Pulp style lyricism – “I’m not trying to stop you love, if we’re gonna do anything we might as well just fuck“, and mid-00s indie guitar lines, The 1975 may well just be the next big thing, that’s if they can hold onto a name for long enough.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
